name: @ipld/fbl
description: `Flexible Byte Layout` is an advanced layout for representing binary data.

scripts.build:schema: echo 'export default ' > schema.js && ipld-schema to-json README.md >> schema.js && standard --fix schema.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage: c8 --reporter=html mocha test/test-*.js && npx st -d coverage -p 8080
